casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Earl COPELAND. No. 292P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Dorothy Powers, Assistant Attorney General, William David McFadyen, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of June 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
